actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Early Childhood, Elementary, and Secondary Education.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Early Childhood, Elementary, and Secondary Education

official_title: To provide for the establishment of a Department of Education program to award grants to secondary schools that establish a project to encourage students in their junior and senior school years to experience career and technical education courses at a community college, and for other purposes.

summary.text:
Collaboration for Today's Education Act or the CTE Act

This bill requires the Department of Education to establish a program to award grants to secondary schools that form a partnership with a community college to allow students in their junior and senior years to experience career and technical education courses at such community college.

titles.title: To provide for the establishment of a Department of Education program to award grants to secondary schools that establish a project to encourage students in their junior and senior school years to experience career and technical education courses at a community college, and for other purposes.
